text: ebævin kavurun ættenma allahtada ohuge dutayatada (mese) avanata vannoda, ovun allahge varaprasadayan laba gat nabivarun, satyavantayin, (ratagama athæra) giya vasasthana piduvan, honda gatipævatum ættavun adin samaga (paralavadi) vasaya karanu æta. movunma itamat alamkaravat sahayayan vannaha
